assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Caverion Oyj, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a service company in building systems, construction services, and services for industry in Northern and Central Europe. It designs, builds, operates, and maintains technical solutions for buildings and industries. The company provides a range of services, including technical and industrial maintenance, smart technologies, and advisory services; property management; delivers building technology and infrastructure projects, such as smart and energy efficient solutions; and industrial engineering and automation, ventilation and air conditioning, cooling and heating, and security and safety services. Its services are used in offices and retail properties, housing, public premises, industrial plants and infrastructure, and other places. The company serves the public sector, real estate users, real estate investors and developers, and general contractors, as well as various industries. Caverion Oyj was founded in 1912 and is headquartered in Vantaa, Finland.
